VTD::EventHandler

VTD::EventHandler Class Reference

The EventHandler class Allows registration of member functions to types deriving from VTD::Event. Events will be immediately dispatched to all functions registered to the respective type. More...

#include <EventHandler.h>

template<class ReceiverT , class EventT >
void deregisterEventFunc (ReceiverT *, void(ReceiverT::*memberFunc)(const EventT *), const ConnectionHandle &handle)

Detailed Description

The EventHandler class Allows registration of member functions to types deriving from VTD::Event. Events will be immediately dispatched to all functions registered to the respective type.
